sentences.en: A high percentage of affiliate links vs regular outbound links.
sentences.cn: 交换链接同普通导出链接之比例相当高,这也是过度网站优化的症状.

sentences.en: Afterwards, data can be shared between and among the root and affiliate registries with the assurance that each given key partition is unique.
sentences.cn: 这样，在确保每一个给定的键分区是唯一的情况下，根注册中心和附属注册中心之间就可以共享数据了。

sentences.en: All youth groups will have to affiliate to the National Youth Agency.
sentences.cn: 所有青年团体必须并入全国青年事务处。

sentences.en: Audited and prepared annual report of corporation and affiliate housing corporations.
sentences.cn: 审查及准备公司,及合作的住屋公司的年度报告.

sentences.en: Cross - linked websites and advertising affiliate programs can also help.
sentences.cn: 交叉结合的互相联的网站和给会员节目做广告都会对此有帮助.

sentences.en: Do I get the product as part of the affiliate program?
sentences.cn: 我得到的附属产品作为节目?

sentences.en: He wanted to affiliate with a U.S. firm because he needed expert advice in legal affairs.
sentences.cn: 他想成为一家美国公司的会员，因为他需要法律事务方面的专家意见。

sentences.en: Ingrain into your website, your unique affiliate links, wherever you see fit.
sentences.cn: 植入到你的网站, 你的独特从属环节, 你认为在哪里.

sentences.en: Integrate, upload, create the affiliate relationships and continue to sell your programs.
sentences.cn: 整合 、 上传 、 建立代销商关系、继而销售您的产品.

sentences.en: Note: some of the links in this post are affiliate links.
sentences.cn: 注释: 这篇文章中的一些链接只提供给会员.

sentences.en: She affiliated herself with the Impressionist school of painting.
sentences.cn: 她加入了印象主义画派。

sentences.en: That is the key to a successful affiliate program.
sentences.cn: 这是成功的关键,从属节目.

sentences.en: The International Development Association ( IDA ) is an affiliate of the World Bank.
sentences.cn: 国际开发协会 ( IDA ) 是世界银行的附属机构.

sentences.en: The Society is not affiliated with any political party.
sentences.cn: 该社团不隶属任何政党。

sentences.en: They tried to affiliate that play to its author.
sentences.cn: 他们试图追寻那个剧本的作者.

sentences.en: Volvo’s Japanese affiliate, Mitsubishi
sentences.cn: 沃尔沃公司在日本的联营公司三菱

sentences.en: We should affiliate with those who can inspire us.
sentences.cn: 留学解答资讯网:我们应该和那些能鼓舞我们的人交往.

sentences.en: What is the difference between affiliate and regular membership?
sentences.cn: 固定会员和附属会员之间的区别是什么?

sentences.en: What of the affiliate groups or the "network of networks"?
sentences.cn: 那些附属组织或者称“网络的网络”又将怎样？

sentences.en: Where can I find PPC Search Engines that offer affiliate programs?
sentences.cn: 哪里可以找到PPC的搜索引擎,提供从属节目?

sentences.en: You can TEST - DRIVE our Affiliate Program at NO COST!
sentences.cn: 你可以试车计画的从属不花钱!

words.tran_cn: 友好关系；加入；联盟；从属关系
使隶属；加入（affiliate的过去分词）
使附属；接纳；使紧密联系

trans.tran_en: a company, organization etc that is connected with or controlled by a larger one
if a group or organization affiliates to or with another larger one, it forms a close connection with it
if a group or organization affiliates to or with another larger one, it forms a close connection with it
